@blueorangutan test

@rhtyd should be fine now, there was a code-style issue which I fixed it.

Okay
@blueorangutan package
@rhtyd a Jenkins job has been kicked to build packages. I'll keep you posted as I make progress.
@borisstoyanov can you launch trillian to this one as well ? Thanks
Looks like wildcard passing of component tests did not work, this only ran smoke tests. Maybe use jenkins directly to kick component tests @borisstoyanov?

I'm not convinced that such a fix is needed. In what scenario do you see such a problem?
@borisstoyanov can we pls try for tomorrow Friday. Thanks
Update with the changes suggested
@borisstoyanov based on these results, are we good to merge ? i have less insight in which are known issues.
Tests LGTM, the failures are caused by known issues and recent regression fixed/merged yesterday. I'll merge based on two code review/lgtms and test results.
Tests LGTM, however we should check new errors seen in test_password_server.py and test_vpc_router_nics.py /cc @nvazquez @borisstoyanov
@nvazquez tests LGTM, however see new errors in test_routers_network_ops.py and test_usage.py
Test LGTM, I'll check if rest of the failures are related to PR or environment introduced. Additional review requested - @marcaurele @wido @ustcweizhou @rafaelweingartner and others.

@fmaximus @krissterckx is this dependent on #2116 and possibly other PRs? I'll kick some tests shortly.
@blueorangutan package
@rhtyd a Jenkins job has been kicked to build packages. I'll keep you posted as I make progress.
Thanks @marcaurele for the review, I've addressed all the raised issues.
Packaging result: ✔centos6 ✔centos7 ✔debian. JID-1450
@rhtyd test_password_server and test_vpc_router_nics are probably not related to this. Please see my testing note from 25th of May, do you think it's still a subject of additional testing?
@rhtyd  The conflict is taken care
Thanks for confirming @borisstoyanov and @wido for the review.
Merging this based on regression tests, code reviews and two LGTMs.
@rhtyd a Jenkins job has been kicked to build packages. I'll keep you posted as I make progress.
Merged this based on test results and two lgtms/code reviews.
@yvsubhash okay let me re-run the tests later today/tomorrow
@blueorangutan package
Tests LGTM.

@sgoeminn @krissterckx @fmaximus  kindly send a new PR to fix additional refactorations especially around APIs as they go with the release's apidocs. If the new APIs are general purpose, please add new marvin tests.

I also see a new regression/failure in `test_internal_lb.py`, please check. Given we're weeks away from 4.11 cut/freezing, please ask additional code reviews on features by non-colleagues. Thanks.
Packaging result: ✔centos6 ✔centos7 ✔debian. JID-1451

@khos2ow the new changes causes management server to fail on start, in a fresh installation. I get:

```
2017-12-21 12:47:53,542 INFO  [c.c.h.x.r.XenServerConnectionPool] (main:null) (logid:) XenServer Connection Pool Configs: sleep.interval.on.error=10000
```
